item.title: One of these novelists will receive the $150K Carol Shields Prize
item.description: The shortlist for the Carol Shields Prize was announced Tuesday morning. The award recognizes "creativity and excellence in fiction by women and non-binary writers in Canada and the United States."

item.title: The most detailed look yet at the 'exodus' of local voting officials
item.description: A new report finds more election officials are leaving their jobs now than at any point in the past two decades. But the report also adds new context to the phenomenon.

item.title: For one Nigerian family, freedom after a kidnapping hasn't ended their terror
item.description: Ten years after the mass abduction of 276 Chibok schoolgirls, kidnapping in Nigeria continues to rise. Nearly 1,000 people were kidnapped in the first three months of 2024. Here is one family's story.
